020
021import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDAPI;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDPair;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDProvider;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.impl.AshconAPI;
025
026import java.util.Optional;
027import java.util.UUID;
028import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
029
030/**
031 * BaseUUIDProvider
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.1.2.0
035 */
036public class BaseUUIDProvider implements UUIDProvider {
037
038  private final ConcurrentHashMap<UUID, UUIDPair> pairs = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
039
040  /**
041   * Returns the associated {@link UUIDAPI uuid api} associated with this provider.
042   *
043   * @return The associated {@link UUIDAPI uuid api} associated with this provider.
044   * @see UUIDAPI
045   */
046  @Override
047  public UUIDAPI api() {
048    return new AshconAPI();
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Used to retrieve a {@link UUIDPair}.
053   *
054   * @param name The username of the pair.
055   *
056   * @return An optional containing the pair if found, otherwise an empty
057   * optional.
058   */
059  @Override
060  public Optional<UUIDPair> retrieve(String name) {
061    for(UUIDPair pair : pairs.values()) {
062      if(pair.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(name)) {
063        return Optional.of(pair);
064      }
065    }
066    return Optional.empty();
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Used to retrieve a name from its associated {@link UUID}.
071   * @param id The {@link UUID} to use in the search.
072   * @return An optional containing the name if found, otherwise an empty optional.
073   */
074  @Override
075  public Optional<String> retrieveName(final UUID id) {
076    if(pairs.containsKey(id)) {
077      return Optional.ofNullable(pairs.get(id).getUsername());
078    }
079    return Optional.empty();
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Used to store a Username & UUID pair. This could be to a map, or to
084   * a database for persistent usage or to both.
085   *
086   * @param pair The {@link UUIDPair}
087   */
088  @Override
089  public void store(UUIDPair pair) {
090    pairs.put(pair.getIdentifier(), pair);
091  }
092}
